title: Project Reborn: New Website on React
description: After spending time studying, learning from mentors, and diving into system design, I realized it was time for a fresh start. So, I’ve just relaunched my portfolio website—now rebuilt in React—to better reflect my growth and make it a more viable long-term project. Feel free to check it out and share your thoughts!

title: Collaboration with CriptoVisualizer Team
description: Exciting collaboration with CriptoVisualizer Team on a new software development project. We are exploring new technologies for trading and analyzing cryptocurrencies!
